TextView.android:text: Realistics who are quick to make practical decisions.

like working alone or in
small groups, prefer a
more deleberate pace, and
like to focus on one
task at a time.

emergized by people,
enjoy a variety of tasks,
a quick pace, and are
good at maultitasking.

people who like to focus on
the facts and details, and
apply common sense and
past experience to come up
with practical solution to
problems.

focus on possibilities and
the big picture, easily see
patterns, value innovation,
and seek creative
solutions to problems.

make decisions using
logical analysis, objectively
weigh pros and cons, and
value honesty, consistency,
and fairness.

sensitive and cooperative,
and decide based on
their own personal values
and how others will be
affected by their actions.

organized and prepared,
like to make and stick
to plans, and are comfortable
following more rules.

keep their options open,
like to be able to act
spontaneously and like to
be flexible with
making plans.
